name: Geno
description:
Welcome to Geno! With this game, you can make your very own levels, and then send them to your friends through Discord or other means!

Join the Discord to play levels made by the community: https://discord.gg/W4jFjzU

SENDING AND PLAYING LEVELS

To send your level to a friend, press the Open Save Folder button on the play menu, then send send the level of choice to your friend.

To import a level that somebody else made, download the level that they sent you, and put it into the Save Folder.

When downloading the game, you can also choose to download some levels to play.

CONTROLS

Play Controls:

  • Move left: A
  • Move right: D
  • Enter door: W
  • Crouch: S
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Super jump: Crouch + Jump

Edit Controls:

  • Move camera: W, A, S, D
  • Fast camera: Shift
  • Place tile: Left Mouse Button
  • Delete tile: Right Mouse Button
  • Select region: Shift (After region is selected, place a tile in it to fill it in)
  • Toggle background: Alt (Allows you to place certain tiles in the background)
  • Switch between Edit/Test mode: Tab

Doors may be a bit confusing. Doors are linked by order they are placed. First door placed will be connected to the second door placed, the third door placed will be connected to the forth door, and so on.
